c74object.name: jcom.oscinstance
c74object.digest: Retrieve instance number or ID from incomming OSC messages.
c74object.description: Retrieve instance number or ID from incomming OSC messages.

outlet.name: OUTLET_NAME
outlet.digest: OSC message with instance info stripped

method.name: bang
method.description: The message bang os passed straight on to the rightmost outlet.

method.name: int
method.description: As integers are not OSC messages, incomming int messages are passed straight to the rightmost outlet.

method.name: float
method.description: As floats are not OSC messages, incomming float messages are passed straight to the rightmost outlet.

method.name: list
method.description: As lists (starting with a number) are not OSC messages, incomming lists are passed straight to the rightmost outlet.

method.name: anything
method.description:
If the incomming symbol is not an OSC message, it is passed straight to the rightmost outlet.
If it is an OSC message, the first branch of the OSC address is examined. If it contains a "." (dot separator) the part of the branch name after the dot is interpreted as an instance identifier. The instance ID or number is returned from the middle outlet, while the remained of the OSC message, with the instance removed, is returned from the leftmost outlet.
If the first branch of the OSC address do not contain a dot instance separator, the message is passed to the rightmost outlet.

seealsolist.seealso: Routing of open sound control messages.
Direct messages and numbers to different outlets.

entry.name: Anything
entry.description:
Out left outlet: If the incomming message is an OSC message with an instance separator in the first branch of the OSC address, the OSC message with the instance removed, is returned from the leftmost outlet.
Out middle outlet: If the incomming message is an OSC message with an instance separator in the first branch of the OSC address, the instance ID or number is returned from the middle outlet.
Out right outlet: If the incomming message is not an OSC message with an instance separator in the first branch of the OSC address, it is returned from the rightmost outlet.
